page.title: 12RECREATION
page.content: {The Community Centre} The Community Centre is on Kingfield Green and has four halls. Some wedding receptions and discos are held there.Other activities in the Community Centre are karate, Ball-room dancing, Modern Sequence dancing, Badminton, Table Tennis, Wine Circle, Drama Group, Weight watchers and much more. {The Good Companion}-is a club that is held in the centre. We visited on Wednesday 8th May 1985. Elderly people over sixty can join. It is held once a month on the second Wednesday. The club is run by Miss Martin. She has been the president for three years. About 197 people are members. The club sells some food more cheaply than in the shops. Soon the club will be going on a boat outing. Every last Wednesday of the month the Good Companions have
